timeline.message:
Parse event fields in C#

Add a function to create variable definition statements, that also adds
attributes to the entity. Add an `event` NamedAttr to event fields. Maybe this
should actually be a keyword attr?

Related to #1392

timeline.bodyText:
in OCaml you can write let ent = { ent with attrs = ent.attrs @ attrs }
and the other ent field will be copied.
timeline.author: aryx

   | _ -> raise Impossible
 
+let var_def_stmt (decls : (entity * variable_definition) list) (attrs : attribute list) =
+  let stmts = List.map (fun (ent, def) ->
